config.title: Configuration
config.description: Configure AI services and processing options

connection.enterProxyFirst: Please enable proxy and configure proxy address first

config.temperatureDescription: Controls AI response randomness, range 0-2, higher values are more random, recommended 0.7
config.processingModeDescription: Text summary mode generates chapter text summaries and correlation analysis; Chapter mind map mode creates independent mind maps for each chapter; Whole book mind map mode integrates the entire book content into one complete mind map.
config.bookTypeDescription: Select book type for more accurate chapter {{type}}. Non-fiction applies to academic, business, self-help and other non-fiction books; Fiction applies to literary works.
config.smartChapterDetectionDescription: When the document has no table of contents, try to intelligently identify chapter titles (such as "Chapter X", "ç¬¬Xç« ", etc.)
config.skipIrrelevantChaptersDescription: Automatically skip acknowledgments, recommended reading, author biography and other non-core content chapters
config.recursionDepthDescription: Only applicable to PDF files. Setting to 0 means no recursive processing of sub-chapters, only processing top-level chapters; setting to a value greater than 0 means recursive processing of the specified number of sub-chapter layers.
config.outputLanguageDescription: Control the language of AI-generated content. Auto mode will follow the current interface language.
config.normalModeDescription: Use basic chapter recognition algorithm, suitable for most books
config.smartDetectionModeDescription: Use AI to intelligently identify chapter boundaries with higher accuracy but longer processing time
config.epubTocModeDescription: Strictly extract chapters according to EPUB file's table of contents structure, maintaining original hierarchy
config.epubTocDepthDescription: Extract only chapters at the selected level, excluding parent or child chapters. For example, selecting Level 2 returns only Level 2 sub-chapters, not Level 1 main chapters
config.chapterNamingModeDescription: Choose the naming style for chapter titles
config.notificationDescription: Send browser notifications when tasks are completed
config.proxyUrlDescription: Enter the complete URL address of the proxy server, for example: http://proxy.example.com:8080
config.geminiApiUrlDescription: Please enter the complete API address, including protocol (http:// or https://)
